message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you a high-quality product today. With an 80% chance of being of exceptional quality, this item is expected to be worth $4000000 to you if it meets your needs. Don't miss out on this opportunity to invest in something truly valuable.
I'd like to pass on this product and see if any other buyers are interested. I'd like to know the probability of a high-quality product being offered to the next buyer.

Given the value of $4000000 associated with a high-quality item, this investment could potentially yield significant returns. If you're interested in exploring further, please let me know.
